New Records: James Harden moved into the No. 2 spot on the career threes list ahead of Ray Allen
Key Match Events: Los Angeles Clippers star James Harden's 116-105 win over the Utah Jazz
Post-Match Reflections: James Harden reflected on his achievement and shouted out some of his teammates who helped him get here: Kevin Durant and Russell Westbrook for creating an example for him in OKC that helped him become great
Miscellaneous Highlights: James Harden believes the record may stand the test of time because Stephen Curry 'can shoot the s--t out of the ball'
Others: There was a time when Kareem Abdul-Jabbar's all-time scoring record looked equally untouchable. Surely no player could maintain the kind of longevity required to pass the legendary center. Then LeBron James made it happen.
